updateMessage: Download progress tracking, offline sync, and WebView stability improvements!
fallbackMessage: No streams available. Please try again later.

sections.title: Features
items: Download Progress Tracking - Downloaded episodes now resume from where you left off (#19 by @SimSalabimse)
Offline Sync - Progress saves locally and automatically syncs when back online (#28 by @ibrahimarijuanaa)
Auto-Scroll to Latest Episode - Media info automatically scrolls to most recently watched episode (#14 by @SimSalabimse)

sections.title: Fixes
items: Episode Label UI - Fixed episode labels wrapping across two lines (#17 by @SimSalabimse)
Player Buffering - Better VLC buffering handling for downloaded files
WebView Stability - Fixed memory leaks and crashes in Turnstile verification
